data.title: Need help identifying a song in Cheech & Chongs next movie
data.meta_description:
I need help identifying a song in Cheech & Chongs next movie.

When Chong and Red (Cheech) leave the record store and jump in the Jag driven by Gloria (Riki...
data.text:
I have a feeling it might not be on that list.

These are the only songs I don't know on that list

Lovin' Machine

Written by Henry Glover

Performed by Wynonie Harris

Courtesy of Gusto Records Inc.

Cross The Tracks

Performed by Joe Houston

Courtesy of Combo Records

A while back I tried to listed to clips of them but I couldn't find one, and the other wasn't it. I'll try to find a clip on you tube

2015-03-19 6:48 pm

#7

Tiny, from the linked thread "Although i could always try contacting Richard "Cheech" Marin or Tommy Chong but i guess reaching them with a silly request like this is a long shot."

Perhaps not. They're still around, and pretty cool guys. I bet they'd respond if the e-mail message was composed appropriately.

•••

2015-03-19 7:38 pm

#8

I sent one last week to Tommy's management contact. Based on the email address it looks like it's his son Paris. So far no response

I also emailed two local classic rock DJ's that I listen to so we'll see what happens
